org.soulwing.prospecto.jaxrs.runtime.resolver

Class ResourceDescriptorUrlResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.soulwing.prospecto.jaxrs.runtime.resolver.ResourceDescriptorUrlResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UrlResolver, ConfigurableUrlResolver

    public class ResourceDescriptorUrlResolver
extends Object
implements ConfigurableUrlResolver
    A simple UrlResolver backed by a set of resource descriptors.
    Author:
    Carl Harris
